ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] New Guild Forming in Tribunal
ygData.msgSnippet: Opps. I forgot to put her name down. It s Rayvena. (lol big suprise there!) Anyway my email is ravens_sorrows@yahoo.com email me so I can know if I made her in
ygData.messageBody:
Opps. I forgot to put her name down. It's Rayvena. (lol big suprise
there!) Anyway my email is ravens_sorrows@... email me so I can
know if I made her in vain.

Raven

--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., ravens_sorrows <no_reply@y...> wrote:
> Well it took me a little bit, but I have started a mage char for
this
> guild. She just got started so she's still lvl 1. (lol I haven't
even
> killed anything yet.) I have never played a mage before. How much
> harder is it to play then an enchanter?
>
> Also I'm sorry for not posting lately. I've had some major tests in
> Bio and Psych. I've also managed to break my hand again so it's in
a
> cast. The bad part is the cast goes past my elbow so it's kinda
hard
> to use a mouse right now.
>
> I'll be able to play more during the Quarter Break. I'll also be
able
> to play a bit more next quarter since my schedule won't be so
> horrible and the classes will be easier.
>
> Raven
>
> --- In theeverquesttavern@y..., PsyKo <sibilant_ghost@y...> wrote:
> > Okay so far we have 2 ppl up for it how bout some more ???
